column5: Is there a bait shop with leeches near or in GTA/Toronto? Thanks.
Lucky Fishing Tackle 4221 Sheppard Ave E Scarborough, ON , M1S5H5 (416) 609-8838
There is a new tackle store opened in Markham (about 300 yards West of Kennedy, on the south side of HW 7) named Bass City, I saw they had leeches last time I was there.
LOL Rick you beat me too it by about 1 min
I think those Leeches are off for the summer but city hall should still have a few around....
You can try Rerries on the south side of Kingston Rd. east of Morningside Ave.   They carry bait.
Trap them yourself.... very very very easy... I save myself money and time by trapping them. I'm very cheap.  Google it you'll see... maybe even youtube.,  RFS     here ya go
pro line at jane and 401 had them last time i was there
I've picked them up at Tighlines in Pickering in the past...
